name: geo.uriit.ru/mp/mapproxy
description: WMS server for Khanty-Mansi Autonomous Okrug (HMAO) based on MapProxy, part of geowebportal based on NextGIS. MapProxy is an open source proxy for geospatial data, caches, accelerates and transforms data from existing map services
owner_name: National Geomatics Center of China (explicitly mentioned as 'поддерживается', more likely a reference than owner; however, regional government responsible for HMAO may be the actual owner)
